title: Dragon Trainer Fizz
body:
I think there should be a dragon trainer fizz because when fizz uses his ult it reminds me of that one scene in "How to train your dragon 1" when Hiccup flew in to the dragon's den and saw that really fat dragon get eaten by a gigantic dragon that popped up from the abyss of the den. Do you think a Dragon Trainer Fizz is a good idea?
this scene:https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&source=images&cd=&ved=0ahUKEwipj4vlqPHLAhWJnYMKHdwsCqcQjhwIBQ&url=http%3A%2F%2Fcinema.theiapolis.com%2Fmovie-2S4X%2Fhow-to-train-your-dragon%2Fgallery%2Fhow-to-train-your-dragon-1041027.html&psig=AFQjCNErLzdwADl0F9IflvojsUKq1RIa5g&ust=1459733265779636&rct=j

replies.body: Dragon rider or aragonite fizz would make more sense, though dragon theme could be pretty cool.
